name: aiconsole
description: AIConsole is an editor that allows you to use your notes to teach AI how tocomplete and automate tasks.

scripts.prepare-all: npm run prepare-python && npm run prepare-frontend && npm run prepare-electron
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-all && npx electron-forge start
scripts.package: npm run prepare-all && npx electron-forge package
scripts.publish: python ./scripts/propagate_version.py && npm run prepare-all && npx electron-forge publish
